function.name: read_image_file
function.description: Accepts an image file name or base64 string and returns a description of its content using a vision model. Provide exactly one of 'file_name' or 'b64_string'.

file_name.description: Name of the image file (e.g., image1.png). Do NOT include directories.

b64_string.description: Base64-encoded string of the image (optional if file_name is provided).

directory.description: Directory where the image file is stored (if using file_name).
